title: Chapter 936 - Escaping Confinement
body:
Chapter 936 - Escaping Confinement

Sword qi intercrossed throughout heaven and earth. Wind and lightning cut through the air.

One terrifying, frenzied demon after another split like paper mache as the indomitable sword light ripped them apart.

Su Yi’s tall, upright figure shuttled between heaven and earth. His entire body was bathed in the light of the Grand Dao, as if he’d been forged from divine gold. Abstruse Celestial clanged and hummed in his grip, and sword shadows filled the air.

He struck like lightning, fierce and tyrannical.

Even demons comparable to Profound Illumination Emperors couldn’t block his path!

Old Yao White Eyebrows watched from a distance, feeling a bit dazed.

He was ancient. To an old fossil like him, a battle of this level wasn’t overly shocking or moving.

What really surprised him was the heaven-defying strength Su Yi displayed as a mere Spiritual Revolution Realm cultivator!

They say that those beneath the Imperial Realm are all ants, yet His Excellency Su has crossed the eternally insurmountable chasm of the Imperial Realm with his Spiritual Revolution Realm cultivation base. He’s strong enough to cut down Emperors!

It seems that after reincarnating, he’s begun down a path that transcends that of his past life. When the time comes...
